name: Spirit Statue Mascot
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the spirit statue is reduced to 0 hit points, the statue crumbles, and the spirit returns to the afterlife in a burst of ghostly white flame. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Counsel of the Past (2/Day)
entries: The spirit statue touches one creature. Once within the next 10 minutes, that creature can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice, immediately after rolling the {@dice d20}.
